kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

test.name: As a user, I want to register on Future Skill platform

kw.name: user is on the Future Skill home page
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.
Opens the Future Skill home page

kw.name: user clicks on "สมัครสมาชิก" button
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//button[text()="สมัครสมาชิก"]'.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'palitauser@example.com' into text field 'xpath=//input[@placeholder="อีเมล"]'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Palita' into text field 'xpath=//input[@placeholder="ชื่อ"]'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Tester' into text field 'xpath=//input[@placeholder="นามสกุล"]'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text '0886168888' into text field 'xpath=//input[@placeholder="เบอร์โทรศัพท์"]'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Test@1111' into text field 'xpath=//input[@placeholder="รหัสผ่าน"]'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Test@1111' into text field 'xpath=//input[@placeholder="ยืนยันรหัสผ่าน"]'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//button[text()="สมัครสมาชิก"]'.

kw.name: system should display OTP page with message "ระบบได้ส่งรหัส OTP ไปยังเบอร์โทรศัพท์"
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.msg: Current page contains element 'xpath=//h6[contains(text(), "ระบบได้ส่งรหัส OTP ไปยังเบอร์โทรศัพท์")]'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

test.doc: Test case for signing up on Future Skill platform
